snippet: Concerns about China’s plunging stock market and a logjam in talks between Greece and its creditors added to the uncertain mood.
abstract: Stock market drops steeply over worries about China's plunging market and Greece.
lead_paragraph: Concerns about China’s plunging stock market and a logjam in talks between Greece and its creditors added to the uncertain mood.

headline.main: Even Without a Shutdown, Investors Had Plenty of Worries
headline.print_headline: Even Without a Shutdown, Investors Had Plenty of Worries
